history.proof: split. - intro H. hauto l: on depth: 3use: rev_involutive. - intro H. sfirstorder depth: 3use: rev_involutive.

exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros X B A. split. - intro H. rewrite <- (rev_involutive X A), <- (rev_involutive X B). rewrite H. reflexivity. - intro H. rewrite <- (rev_involutive X A), <- (rev_involutive X B). rewrite H. reflexivity.
